title: What is the status of the office building on Oleander that was heavily damaged by fire last year?  It is in the same condition that it was the day after the fire.  Does the city have any clout over boarding up, repairing or demolishing the building?  Are there no code enforcement actions that can be taken?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/04/what-is-the-status-of-the-office-building-on-oleander-that-was-heavily-damaged-by-fire-last-year/
